tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NNS Thoughts)) (: :) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP want) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB give) (NP (NNP Peeta) (NNP Mellark)) (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN hug))))))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (IN For) (ADVP (ADVP (RB as) (JJ long)) (IN as)) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ takes)) (. .)))
